about_the_game:
Don't Be a Hero Tells a story about overcoming challenges and becoming a hero

As a warrior who wants to be a hero, you must pass three trials, each with a hero in charge, you must defeat him in order to gain recognition

Before you defeat the hero, you will first learn the story of each hero's tragedy and defeat the hero's enemies in the story. However, if tragedy is all hero's fate, do you really still want to be a hero?

Face dozens of strong bosses with different characteristics

There are no weak enemies, every battle is a BOSS battle

Each trial consists of five BOSS battles, including a showdown with the trial hero himself. It will take at least 15 tough battles to pass all three trials. Each BOSS uses completely different moves, and even many battles use special mechanics, which can only be won by figuring out the best strategy for each battle

See through and decipher the enemy's super skill

Every BOSS uses at least one super skill. It can deal an unendurable amount of damage, but each super skill has a different break condition, and if it is achieved, the BOSS will go into a frustrated state, be unable to move and take additional damage. Successfully decoding the super sill is the key to winning the battle

Feel free to assemble your team

Your team must have three helpers in each battle, and as the trial progresses, more than 20 helpers will join you, each with three different active skills and one passive skill, and you must choose the most appropriate combination for each battle

Accumulate hero points and decide the game

You can use powerful hero weapon and unleash weapon skill that are enough to set the stage for victory. However, weapon skill require hero points to be accumulated in order to use them, and each helper usually has at least one way to accumulate hero points, which are also awarded when you break boss's super skill. You will also unlock a variety of different weapons as the trial progresses

A wide variety of NPCS with great personalities

In the starting and ending towns of the game, there are several NPCS living with very personality, in addition to participating in the battle of the trial, and chatting with the NPC is also a great fun. Through the chat you will learn about all aspects of life in the beginning and end of the town, and may also be able to learn some unknown secrets, so as to get help in the trial

Create your own epic

The poet in the town of Qi and end is willing to write a heroic epic for you, he will ask you what you think about something, and depending on the answer, his creation will be different. You'll get your own heroic epic

Uncovering the secrets of the start and end towns

Where is the town and why does it exist? There is a villager who is very curious about this, and with your help, she may finally be able to solve all the secrets here

Pure hand-drawn world

You may find the style of this game a little strange... Well, because it was hand-painted by a non-academic author! ... Here you can feel the unique architecture, scenery, people and... Monster

short_description: This is a story about overcoming challenges and becoming a hero. A total of three trials await you, and you must defeat several powerful enemies in order to pass. Every battle is difficult, you must read the enemy's moves, choose the right aid, and adopt the right strategy to win.
